pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena brāhmaṇena saṃghassa payopānaṃ paṭiyattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.7: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu saṃghaṃ ārabbha davaṃ karissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.8: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, saṃghaṃ ārabbha davaṃ akāsī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.11: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, saṃghaṃ ārabbha davaṃ karissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.15: “na, bhikkhave, buddhaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā saṃghaṃ vā ārabbha davo kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.17: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.21: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca surusurukārakaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
